// Problem Code : Collinear Points
// Problem URL : http://www.codechef.com/problems/CB04/
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdio>
#include <set>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
			int n;
			scanf("%d",&n);
			int arr[n][2];
			for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
				cin >> arr[i][0] >> arr[i][1];
			// If there is only a single point
			if(n == 1)
				{
					cout << "0\n";
					continue;
				}
			int max = 1;
			for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
			{
				float slope[n - i - 1];
				int k = 0;
				for(int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j)
				{
					slope[k++] = ((float)arr[j][1] - (float)arr[i][1]) / ((float)arr[j][0] - (float)arr[i][0]);
				}
				sort(slope, slope + n - i - 1);
				int temp_max = 1;
				for(int j = 0; j < n - i - 1; ++j)
				{
					if(slope[j] == slope[j + 1])
						temp_max++;
					else
						{
							if(temp_max > max)
								max = temp_max;
							temp_max = 1;
						}
				}
			}
			cout << max + 1 << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
